title: Gated Apartment Community, Microwave, Dishwasher
neighborhood: 17621 W. Pauline Ct., Canyon Country, CA
posting_body: ['At Colony Townhomes in Santa Clarita, our apartments are a place you will love coming home to.', "Each of our available apartments has access to a beautiful picnic area with a barbecue and play area, which means you'll always have a place to take your family and friends.", 'We also provide great amenities for residents, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, a cool swimming pool, and a relaxing spa for residents to maintain their high-energy lifestyles.', 'Each of our apartments also feature a personal garage for easy parking.', 'AMENITIES AND FEATURES', '-Crown Molding', '-Dishwasher', '-Energy Efficient Hydronic Heating', '-Maple Hardwood Cabinets', '-Dramatic Recessed Lighting', '-Easy Access to Freeways', '-Microwave', '-On Site Maintenance', '-Five Sparkling Pools with Wading Pools', '-9-12ft Ceilings', '-Digital TV Available', '-Granite Countertops', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'WEBSITE', '<URL>', 'ADDRESS', '17621 W. Pauline Ct., Canyon Country, CA 91387', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.']
